description: INDB files are used by InDesign to compile documents into a larger book, as well as publishing and printing the final copy. The files are also helpful for saving computer resources while editing since the computer does not have to load all of the INDD file contents while creating the book.
NOTE: To create an INDB file, select File → New → Book... , name your book, choose your save location, and click Save .
